short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the Bestowd extension to create personalized hand curated gift galleries for yourself and for your friends and loved ones!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bestowd is a social gifting platform that helps you find the perfect gift for every personality and every occasion. Give your giftees exactly what they want, without losing the surprise factor! 
 
With Bestowd you can:

Browse our Curated Gift Galleries
Choose from carefully curated gifts that fit specific personalities and passions, wowing your friends! (even your in-laws).

Check-out Your Friends' Wishlists
Get some inspiration from the source itself! Check out what your friends want and become a legendary gifter!

Add Your Own Gift Ideas
Come across some good stuff? Stash away gift ideas for the next special occasion.

Covertly Inquire about the Perfect Gift
Anonymously send your top three gift ideas to the giftee, letting them choose the one they love the most while keeping them in suspense!
